message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. Let's start the negotiations!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $1,400,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,400,000 simply doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This price still leaves room for a healthy profit for both of us. Let's find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $1,550,000. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise while still saving you some money compared to your initial asking price.
